content: {"name": "Helping Hurting People", "alternate_name": "", "description": " It's important to call first to check availability, hours and what assistance is needed for any particular day.\n The Helping Hurting People Soup Kitchen, Food Pantry and Clothes Closet serves people in need from Anne Arundel and Baltimore County and Baltimore seven days a week as needed", "email": "", "url": "https://www.justserve.org/projects/e662b96a-1ecd-4477-8d51-d41fdc7180eb/helping-hurting-people?cid=vm_2022_justserve&shiftId=2b1f3444-4654-4629-9d4b-7c1bfc3d1fbe", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "7629B Spencer Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Glen Burnie", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21060", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.1545718, "longitude": -76.5865967}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 766-7690", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "05:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "05:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "05:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "05:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "05:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
